column5: Just wanted everyone to know that J&J's is now a licensed liquor store. Once the border opens up, you can purchase your beer right there in Morson!
Good for them. They've been working on it for several years.
What goes around comes around, used to be able to purchase at Morson. Bill
Better than having to go all the way back to the LCBO in RR mid week!!Zig's still hanging in there as well? Wow I miss it up there!
Zigs is still hanging in there.
You know we will buy from them, ..... when " it " opens. We are just waiting Jared.
I would imagine Labatts beer sales are taking a hit ? Hope the prices dont increase to bad !
Quarantine and very little work... plus the government sending a couple grand a month. I bet they have had a hard time keeping enough beer in stock.
Nah. Alot of the locals prefer Crown........?
